BIO

Heyy! I am a twenty something computer science student not based in Nakuru,Kenya. I study at Egerton University Njoro campus and i am currently in my final year of study and will be ready to show the world my superpowers by April next year. I am a big fan of playing soccer and wait for it....(I support Manchester United).its okey.I know you support them too.

I play chess and i dare you to challenge me.If you win...you buy me coffee. (dont worry though..you won't win). My ambition is to change the world a step at a time for as long as i live and to inspire others to develop their skills and improve their lives..I am also a self proclaimed motivational speaker.Just ask my friends.

2016-current

University

Computer Science Student

In my final year of study and i cant wait to apply the skills i've learnt out there.Hoping to work with a team of inspiring people in any field of life that comes my way.I am well versed with anything business. Am Itching to be involved in life changing projects.
